roleset.name: droop or sag from lack of tautness
roleset.note: SWAG-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class spatial_configuration-47.6. No Framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from swag.01-v)

example.name: transative example
example.text: His long, sandy side whiskers swagged his mustache.

example.name: intransative example
example.text: If she but swag, she's gone.

roleset.name: sway unsteadily or stagger
roleset.note: SWAG-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3 and run-51.3.2. No Framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from swag.02-v)

role.descr: Agent or cause of an entity's swaying

example.name: agent as swayer
example.text: The drunken man swagged into the room.

example.name: agent as cause of swagging
example.text: Hal swagged his tail across the tall weeds.
